attributes.action: We want better awareness and support for parents who have children with adhd and other related learning difficulties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: breaking links is a new group in the north of england and we want more awareness and support for parents who have children with adhd and other related learning difficulties. We think it is inportant to make people more aware of this condition and work with it in a positive way. It's our opinion if people are given better support quicker that many problems that linked to adhd may be removed.
